summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 GEORGIE BOY CRUISE MASTER MOTOR HOME WITH A WORKHORSE CHASSIS. THE CONTACT WAS DRIVING 55-60 MPH WHEN HE APPLIED THE BRAKES AND THE PEDAL FELL ABNORMALLY FARTHER INTO THE FLOORBOARD THAN USUAL. ALL WARNING LIGHTS WERE ILLUMINATED AT THE TIME OF THE FAILURE. THE CONTACT WAS ABLE TO DRIVE TO HIS RESIDENCE AT RELATIVELY LOW SPEED. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO AN AUTHORIZED DEALER WHERE THE WHEEL SPEED SENSORS WERE REPLACED AND THE BRAKE FLUID WAS FLUSHED. THE FAILURE RECURRED WITHIN EIGHT MONTHS. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED AGAIN TO THE DEALER WHERE TWO REAR CALIPERS, WHEEL SENSORS, BRAKE PADS AND BRAKE FLUID WERE REPLACED. A BRAKE FLUSH WAS ALSO PERFORMED. THE CONTACT REFERENCED NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER: 09V193000 (SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC: FLUID) BUT WAS UNABLE TO CONFIRM IF HIS VEHICLE WAS INCLUDED IN THE RECALL. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 20,000 AND THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 22,500.

THE CONSUMER HAS HAD NUMEROUS PROBLEMS WITH HER GEORGIE BOY MOTORHOME.  SOME OF THE PROBLEMS INCLUDE LOOSE DOOR LOCKS AND POP OUT WALL THAT WOULD NOT AUTOMATICALLY, ETC.  *NM  THE CONSUMER NOTICED GRAY WATER LEAKING FROM UNDER THE HOLDING TANK AND WAS FLOODING THE BACK BATHROOM.  ON ONE OCCASION, THE MOTORHOME WOULD NOT START, IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT 5 BATTERY CABLES WERE NOT SECURED PROPERLY.   WHILE DRIVING, THE WASHER/DRYER FELL OUT FROM ITS HOLDING AREA AND DAMAGED THE INSIDE WALL.  THE SHOWER WAS LEAKING. THE STEPS OF THE MORE HOME HAD FALLEN OUT AND DAMAGED A MOTORIST TRUCK.  THE CRUISE CONTROL WAS INOPERATIVE, THERE WAS EXCESSIVE AIR COMING FROM UNDER THE DASH PANEL.  *JB

DT:  THE CONTACT STATES WHILE PERFORMING MAINTENANCE HE DISCOVERED THE FUEL LINE WAS RUBBING THE FLOOR OF THE RV.  THE SHARP PART OF THE METAL FLOORING HAD BEGUN TO WEAR INTO THE FUEL LINE.  HE DID NOT TAKE THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER.  HE PERFORMED PREVENTIVE MEASURES BY CUTTING BACK THE FLOOR BOARD AND ADDED INSULATION TO THE FUEL HOUSING AS WELL AS A RUBBER COATING.  THERE HAVE BEEN NO FURTHER PROBLEMS SINCE THE REPAIR.  THIS IS MANUFACTURED BY GEORGIE BOY AND THE MODEL IS A 2005 LANDOU LS.  *NM
